SEARCH
Package com.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api.annotations

Annotationsschnittstelle GeneratorFeatures

@Retention(SOURCE) @Target(TYPE) public @interface GeneratorFeatures
Declares the features supported by a code generator module.

This annotation is placed on the class that implements a generator (e.g., TemplateRegistration) and is used by the Cloudhopper annotation processor to understand:

  • Which annotations the generator supports
  • Which attributes of those annotations are recognized

This enables validation during annotation processing and allows tools to provide early feedback when unsupported annotations or attributes are used.

Example


 @GeneratorFeatures(
     generatorId = "aws-terraform-java21",
     supportedFeatures = {
         @GeneratorFeature(
             supportedAnnotation = Function.class,
             supportedAttributes = {
                 FunctionAttribute.NAME,
                 FunctionAttribute.TIMEOUT,
                 FunctionAttribute.MEMORY
             }
         ),
         @GeneratorFeature(
             supportedAnnotation = Schedule.class,
             supportedAttributes = {
                 ScheduleAttribute.CRON,
                 ScheduleAttribute.TIMEZONE
             }
         )
     }
 )
 public class AwsTemplateRegistration implements TemplateRegistration {
     ...
 }

  • Erforderliche Elemente - Übersicht

    Erforderliche Elemente
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Erforderliches Element
    Beschreibung
    String
    generatorId
    The unique ID of the generator implementation.

  • Optionale Elemente - Übersicht

    Optionale Elemente
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Optionales Element
    Beschreibung
    GeneratorFeature[]
    supportedFeatures
    A list of features (annotations and their attributes) that this generator supports.

  • Elementdetails

    • generatorId

      String generatorId
      The unique ID of the generator implementation.

      This is used to associate the feature declarations with the correct generator.

      Gibt zurück:
      the generator identifier

    • supportedFeatures

      GeneratorFeature[] supportedFeatures
      A list of features (annotations and their attributes) that this generator supports.
      Gibt zurück:
      array of supported annotation features
      Standard:
      {}
